contesttimer
Class Problem

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  contesttimer.Problem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Problem
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A instance of class Problem represents the time elapsed and status (running, paused for judging or solved) of the solution to one programming problem. Visually, the a JPanel of the problem number, the elapsed time and a button to toggle through the three possible states of the solution to the programming problem.

See Also:
Serialized Form
